short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture colors using a color-picker from anywhere on your computer and seamlessly save them to your Google Sheets for easy access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Pick Colors from Your Browser and Desktop
2. Save Colors into Google Sheet
3. Import into Figma as Color Swatches. 


***Upcoming Improvements***

Extension: 
1. Auto-Copy to Clipboard
2. Foldable Small Menu Window in Pick Up Mode
3. Serial Pick Mode
4. Auto-Save into Sheet. 


Figma Plug In: 

1. GRB Filtering
2. Ranking Filtering
3. Search for Comments
